title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Split

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater fits well, being long enough to cover the rear, and appreciate its comfort, soft fabric, and lightweight design that's perfect for layering with leggings. The appearance receives mixed feedback, with some saying it looks nice while others find it cheap-looking. The material quality is also mixed, with some finding it nice while others report poor quality.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fashion forward
items.body: I love these tunic sweaters. I love to wear them with leggings. They just cover everything that needs to be covered but still stylish. Not too thick so I could wear a jacket over or wear it like that in the cool months fall. They are picking up so your bra doesn't show quality is nice The colors are perfect for fall and they're so soft and comfortable They have a nice loose fit.. definitely true size Read more
items.author: rivera

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft fabric and long
items.body: These sweaters are amazing! Very soft and not to heavy, they are also long enough to cover the bottom! I wear them with leggings! The material is good quality. I purchased a L and I am a 38D and normally wear a L/XL top so they are pretty true to size I would say. I will purchase more colors forsure! Read more
items.author: Kristen Doyle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfortable
items.body: I have bought these twice, because I love them so much. They are soft, long, and comfortable. I am tall, with long arms, and it is hard to find anything that fits me. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars True to size
items.body: The fabric is thin and not high quality, but it looks nice. The fit is true to size. Read more
items.author: Brenda H. Michigan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute
items.body: These are so soft and comfortable. They pair great with leggings. They are true to size as well Read more
items.author: Andrea

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, but thin
items.body: They are soft and a great length for my 5' self, but they are thin. I wouldn't be wearing this by itself on any cold day. I do not like hand washing clothes, so it's nice that these can go in the washing machine (but not the dryer). Read more
items.author: Kisha Ibarra

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars CHARGED FOR NOT RETURNING SOMETHING IN OCTOBER, DUE TO POOR QUALITY - WHO DOES THAT?
items.body: I returned this item along with another item. Customer service told me they received two items back and these three shirts were in one of the packages since the total weight of the return proved that so they said ignore all notes about not getting this return and I did until now they have charged me for not returning this. I told Amazon the reason for return was poor quality material and to thin. Why would I do that and keep this. THIS PRODUCT IS SO BAD THEY CAN'T SELL IT SO NOW THEY ARE SAYING YOU DID NOT RETURN AND JUST CHARGE YOUR PAYMENT METHOD. I HAVE DISPUTED WITH CREDIT CARD COMPANY PROVIDING ALL DETAILS... Read more
items.author: RSF

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight Sweater
items.body: Autumn ready. Perfect for layering. Soft and comfortable. Read more
items.author: My Animals Love This Spread!

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Split is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Split is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brick Red, Sapphire Green, Black, Coffee, Brown, Black, Black, Gray Green, Wine Red, Dark Gray, Green, Caramel, Pink, Blue, Black, Black, Red, Apricot, Black, Gray, Light Gray, Bean Green, Brown, Dark Gray, Black, Apricot, Blue, Black, Blue, Fuchsia, Coffee, Light Gray, Dark Gray, Navy Blue, Wine Red, Black, Peacock Blue, Coffee, Black, Light Purple, Apricot, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
